products:
[.::STAIRCASES::.]
Our core business is fine woodworking. We custom manufacture all elements related to the staircase industry. We make posts, treads (steps), balustrades (spindles or pickets), handrails as well as entire staircases made only from red oak. Combining the custom manufacturing facility along with skilled installation crews allow us to renovate your staircase in approximately 3-5 days. Visit our website www.idealstairs.ca to view our Testimonials, and listen to very satisfied clients who have generously allowed us to record their successful renovation in their own words.
 

[.::FLOORING - HARDWOOD AND LAMINATE::.]
Staircase renovation is not our only product. We believe we are the only staircase manufacturer that will renovate your staircase AND install hardwood flooring. We want to minimize the time and disruption in your home by coordinating these two products. We are dealers for many brands of hardwood and laminate flooring but our proudest boast is we have hardwood flooring that is 25% and 100% Canadian content. We offer custom colours on your hardwood flooring (over 750 square feet) for Red Oak and Maple. We value our premium service by supplying and ensuring the colour you choose for your flooring is also used on the renovated staircase.
 

[.::SANDING AND STAINING::.]
If you already have a solid oak staircase but you want it changed to a different colour, we also provide sanding and re-staining services. We can transform your builder staircase into a dream staircase easily within your budget. While you are considering changing the colour of your staircase, this is an excellent time to change the appearance. Since we will be taking off the handrail, pickets and posts to sand and stain your steps, take the opportunity to install another post style, such as square, remodel your existing pickets and changing the look from old to new. For the record

Alumarail Manufacturing Inc. has been in the aluminum business since 1983, providing maintenance free aluminum railings for homes and special projects.  Specializing in aluminum railings for your home or business, custom made to satisfy your requirements.  We manufacture aluminum railings, gates, fences and columns, in a variety of styles and colors.  We strive to be the leader in quality aluminum products and continue to exceed every customers expectation.  All our railings meet the Ontario Building Code.

With an aluminum railing from Alumarail you get the beauty of wrought iron without the hassle... Railings that are maintenance free and never rust. What’s more you get the expertise, commitment and customer satisfaction that comes with a company that has been in business for over 35 years. Alumarail uses the finest aluminum extrusion companies in Canada, the colors are baked, not powder-coated, to ensure a lasting, UV resistant finish.
 
If you want to save some money on installation you can purchase material and do it yourself, Alumarail will instruct you on the proper techniques. Just let us know you are interested in our "Do it Yourself" program and we will be happy to assist you. We also do new custom-built homes and subdivisions.

If you want to transform the look of your home and reduce maintenance, call Alumarail today for a free estimate or drop by our showroom.


Please visit us at our Showroom 
151A JEVLAN DRIVE, Woodbridge On. L4L 8A8.
Mon-Friday 8am to 5pm 
Monday -Friday 8am to 4pm * winter hours *
Saturday by Appointment Only

Proweld is your choice for Wrought Iron Railings, Stainless Steel Railings, Glass Railings, Aluminum Railings, Gate, Fence,Indoor,Outdoor.

Pro Weld provides complete welding services, fabrication and mobile welding services. Pro Weld has been serving the Greater Toronto Area communities for over 20 years. We are CWB certified.

The company was established in 1990, with customer service and professionalism in mind.

We provide complete mobile welding and fabrication services. We are equipped to handle large and small, residential and industrial projects.

We are experienced with all types of general welding and specialty welding:

    Certified High Pressure Welders
    Heavy Equipment Repairs
    On site Fabrication
    Welding on Steel, Aluminum, Stainless Steel, Cast Iron and all other metals.

Our company specializes in on-site welding of vehicles, modern, commercial, agricultural, classic and prototype. For larger projects we are pleased to offer workshop facilities using the most modern equipment in a fully insured secure environment.

In addition, we provide an onsite welding service to the Construction, Aero and Marine Industries.

We utilize the full range of welding and Plasma cutting equipment including Mig, Tig and Arc, thereby enabling us to weld or cut a range of materials from Mild Steel and Stainless to Cast and Aluminum.

Here is a sample of completed projects that show a range of welding and fabrication assignments. Please fill out a quotation request form or email us, for a free estimate for your specific requirements. Pro Weld has the experience and expertise to do the job right! Your satisfaction is our number one concern, and we would be happy to handle any welding project from start to finish. Call us to get your project on the right track.

Sincerely,
Tal Drori – President
Pro Weld Ltd.
